page.title: 06ASHTON BROTHERS.
page.content: The textile company of Ashton Brothers is closely linked with the town of{ {Hyde}and in particular the district of {Flowery Field.}Here,the Ashton family built the church and school (now disused but still standing) and an estate of several hundred houses for it's employees.In 1881,when the town was granted it's Borough Charter,{ {Thomas Ashton}became it's first mayor. In 1905,the company became the first in Europe to install automatic looms. In{1985}the{Carrfield Mill}site at Flowery Field employs{740}workers although production is now limited to plain dyed towels and babies' nappies instead of the 27 items advertised in the catalogue of 1961.
